channel.title: I got this error when 'running' my source Please HELP
channel.description:
Ok i got this error when trying to run my source, [IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/xneln4.jpg[/img]
If you know how to fix it please tell me so,
Thanks, Nick.

item.title: I got this error when 'running' my source Please HELP
item.dc:creator: @d_man103456 d man103456
item.description:
@d_man103456 wrote:

We encourage independent thought, meaning you must help yourselves before requesting help. Failure to provide some sort of prior knowledge or work to the problem will result in a lock of the topic. This is final.

Read full topic

item.title: I got this error when 'running' my source Please HELP
item.dc:creator: @hyphy_ftw hyphy ftw
item.description:
@hyphy_ftw wrote:

Just wondering but would i be getting the error from having an npc dropping too many items, or some items might be making this error happen?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 07, 2009, 07:44:08 pm[/size][hr]Because this is what Graador drops

//general graardor npcdrop = 1115 995 15000000 5 npcdrop = 1115 8100 1 2 npcdrop = 1115 526 1 100 npcdrop = 1115 748 1 1 npcdrop = 1115 7608 1 2 npcdrop = 1115 7609 1 2 npcdrop = 1115 1107 1 2 npcdrop = 1115 1077 1 2 npcdrop = 1115 35 1 4 npcdrop = 1115 7611 1 2 npcdrop = 1115 2743 1 1 npcdrop = 1115 2742 1 1 npcdrop = 1115 2744 1 1 npcdrop = 1115 2740 1 1 npcdrop = 1115 2741 1 1 npcdrop = 1115 667 1 4 npcdrop = 1115 2402 1 4 npcdrop = 1115 746 1 4 npcdrop = 1115 8002 1 1 npcdrop = 1115 13665 1 1 npcdrop = 1115 13643 1 1 npcdrop = 1115 13644 1 1 npcdrop = 1115 1700 1 1 npcdrop = 1115 13649 1 1 npcdrop = 1115 13650 1 1 npcdrop = 1115 13645 1 1 npcdrop = 1115 13648 1 1 npcdrop = 1115 13642 1 1 npcdrop = 1115 13646 1 1

item.title: I got this error when 'running' my source Please HELP
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

Okay, you really couldnt tell it was an NPCDrops error, when it plainly states that in the exception?

  1. You’re expecting to be spoonfed. And it’s pathetic. You cant just post every simple error here, and expect everyone to jump all over it and solve it for you.
    We are here to help you by giving you templates to follow, and trying to help you learn.

We are not here to solve your problems fully for you.

Read full topic

item.title: I got this error when 'running' my source Please HELP
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

[quote=“raped by who, post:9, topic:293606”]None of you know what you’re talking about.

Hyphy, instead of hoping to be spoonfed throughout your entire Java career, and probably your entire life

how about actually attempting to put effort into someting and LEARN.
learn about java’s basics, the exceptions, arrays, etc, before attempting a project[/quote]

Okay, okay, read what I said, and read the error’s text. It has ‘loadNPCdrops’ and if you know what ‘NPC drops’ are Mr. Java god, you’ll know what I’m talking about.

Read full topic
